style="edgeLabel;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];fontSize=12;" parent="1" connectable="0" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="320" y="520" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ioDcozThFrYkQm-MUfUO-10" value="Note: The functions here follow a common convention. Functions passed as props begin with "on" and functions in components begin with "handle"." style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=#FF66B3;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=12;fontStyle=1;autosize=0;resizable=1;fontColor=#FFFFFF;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="450" y="470" width="250" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ioDcozThFrYkQm-MUfUO-11" value="onPerformAction(data)" style="edgeLabel;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];fontSize=12;" parent="1" connectable="0" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="320" y="680" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ioDcozThFrYkQm-MUfUO-14" value="<div style=""><font color="#ffffff">But here's a neat trick:</font></div>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=1;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=#FF66B3;fontSize=12;fontStyle=1;direction=west;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="60" y="484" width="160" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ioDcozThFrYkQm-MUfUO-16" value="<font color="#1a1a1a">iskind={true}</font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=#000000;fillColor=none;fontSize=12;fontColor=#FF0000;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="326" y="395" width="90" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ioDcozThFrYkQm-MUfUO-23" value="<font size="1" style=""><b style="font-size: 15px;">Component.svelte</b></font>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#007FFF;strokeColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="250" y="740" width="140" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ioDcozThFrYkQm-MUfUO-27" value="<font color="#1a1a1a">Legend:<br><span style="font-weight: normal;"><span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>Component<br><span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>Props<br><span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>Passing data upwards with a function passed as props<br><span style="white-space: pre;">&nbsp; </span>(Global) Store<br><span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>Context API</span></font>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=12;fontStyle=1" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="60" y="180" width="350" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ioDcozThFrYkQm-MUfUO-35" value="<font color="#1a1a1a" style="font-size: 40px;"><b style="">Ways of passing data in WebFrameworks</b></font>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=15;fontColor=#00CC00;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="60" y="59" width="430" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ioDcozThFrYkQm-MUfUO-39" value="" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;fontSize=40;fillColor=#FF9999;strokeColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="60" y="251" width="10" height="10" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ioDcozThFrYkQm-MUfUO-43" value="" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;fontSize=40;strokeColor=#1A1A1A;fillColor=#FFFFFF;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="60" y="208" width="10" height="10" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ioDcozThFrYkQm-MUfUO-45" value="" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;fontSize=40;fillColor=#FF66B3;strokeColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="60" y="222" width="10" height="10" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ioDcozThFrYkQm-MUfUO-49" value="" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;fontSize=40;fillColor=#00CCCC;strokeColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="60" y="237" width="10" height="10" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ioDcozThFrYkQm-MUfUO-52" value="" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;fontSize=40;fillColor=#007FFF;strokeColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="60" y="193" width="10" height="10" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ioDcozThFrYkQm-MUfUO-53" value="Props can only be passed downwards...&nbsp;" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=12;fontStyle=1;strokeColor=#1A1A1A;fontColor=#000000;fillColor=#FFFFFF;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="60" y="400" width="160" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ioDcozThFrYkQm-MUfUO-58" value="<div style=""><font color="#1a1a1a">DISCUSSION</font></div><div style=""></div><font color="#1a1a1a"><br></font><div style=""><font color="#1a1a1a"><span style="background-color: initial;">Props</span><span style="background-color: initial;">:</span></font></div><div style="font-weight: normal;"><span style="background-color: initial;"><font color="#1a1a1a">Only use for components that always belong together or as props that extends the reusability of a component. A potential problem is that props ruin the reusability of single components if they force a certain structure.</font></span></div><div style=""><span style="font-weight: 400;"><font color="#1a1a1a"><br></font></span></div><div style=""><font style="" color="#1a1a1a"><span style="background-color: initial;">Sending data upwards through props</span><span style="background-color: initial;">:</span></font></div><div style="font-weight: 400;"><span style="background-color: initial;"><font color="#1a1a1a">The same problem as above but worse. Either the child cannot exist without its parent anymore or every component that wants to use the child must implement the same handler method.</font></span></div><div style=""><br></div>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=12;fontStyle=1;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="60" y="850" width="700" height="149" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="1ryAwQOCqGC8vMPPf8pe-5" value="<font color="#ffffff">Data gets passed upwards&nbsp;</font><span style="text-align: left; background-color: initial; color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">by calling&nbsp;<br></span><span style="text-align: left; background-color: initial; color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">a function&nbsp;</span><span style="text-align: left; background-color: initial; color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">that is defined further up in the hierarchy.</span>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=#FF66B3;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=12;fontStyle=1;autosize=0;resizable=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="450" y="615" width="250" height="45" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="joCx3huDAaNIsLEse6iR-38" relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="joCx3huDAaNIsLEse6iR-39" value="<font style="font-size: 16px;"><b>App.svelte</b></font>" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=1;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;fontSize=16;fontColor=#00CC00;dashed=1;dashPattern=1 as="geometry"> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="1364" y="500" /> <mxPoint x="1364" y="200" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="joCx3huDAaNIsLEse6iR-43" value="<font style="font-size: 16px;"><b>Parent.svelte</b></font>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#007FFF;strokeColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="1078" y="470" width="140" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="joCx3huDAaNIsLEse6iR-44" 1;fontSize=16;fontColor=#00CC00;strokeWidth=1.5;strokeColor=#1A1A1A;endArrow=block;endFill=1;" parent="1" source="joCx3huDAaNIsLEse6iR-46" target="joCx3huDAaNIsLEse6iR-53" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="1198" y="675" /> <mxPoint x="1198" y="670" /> <mxPoint x="1588" y="670" /> <mxPoint x="1588" y="200" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="joCx3huDAaNIsLEse6iR-46" value="<font style="font-size: 16px;"><b>Child.svelte</b></font>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#007FFF;strokeColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="1078" y="630" width="140" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="joCx3huDAaNIsLEse6iR-53" value="<b><font color="#1a1a1a" style="font-size: 16px;">Store</font></b>" style="shape=cylinder3;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;boundedLbl=1;backgroundOutline=1;size=15;fontSize=12;fontColor=#330000;strokeColor=#1A1A1A;fillColor=#FFFFFF;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="1418" y="160" width="60" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="joCx3huDAaNIsLEse6iR-54" value="<b style=""><font color="#ffffff">All components can access all stores.<br>If it's a writable store they can update it.<br>If it's a readable they can only get the value.</font></b>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=#00CCCC;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=12;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="1328" y="250" width="250" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="joCx3huDAaNIsLEse6iR-55" value="<font size="1" style=""><b style="font-size: 15px;">Component.svelte</b></font>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#007FFF;strokeColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="1078" y="740" width="140" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="joCx3huDAaNIsLEse6iR-56" value="<font color="#1a1a1a">Legend:<br><span style="font-weight: normal;"><span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>Component<br><span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>Props<br><span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>Passing data upwards with a function passed as props<br><span style="white-space: pre;">&nbsp; </span>(Global) Store<br><span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>Context API</span></font>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=12;fontStyle=1" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="888" y="180" width="350" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="joCx3huDAaNIsLEse6iR-57" value="<font color="#ffffff"><b style="">Note:&nbsp;</b></font><b style="color: rgb(255, 255, 255); background-color: initial;">Stores are outside of <br>the component hierarchy&nbsp;and defined in .js files.</b><font color="#ffffff"><b style=""><br></b></font>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=#00CCCC;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=12;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="1358" y="105" width="180" height="45" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="joCx3huDAaNIsLEse6iR-60" value="<font color="#1a1a1a" style="font-size: 40px;"><b style="">Ways of passing data in WebFrameworks</b></font>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=15;fontColor=#00CC00;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="888" y="59" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;fontSize=40;strokeColor=#1A1A1A;fillColor=#FFFFFF;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="888" y="208" width="10" height="10" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="joCx3huDAaNIsLEse6iR-65" value="" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;fontSize=40;fillColor=#FF66B3;strokeColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="888" y="222" width="10" height="10" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="joCx3huDAaNIsLEse6iR-66" value="" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;fontSize=40;fillColor=#00CCCC;strokeColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="888" y="237" width="10" height="10" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="joCx3huDAaNIsLEse6iR-67" value="" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;fontSize=40;fillColor=#007FFF;strokeColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="888" y="193" width="10" height="10" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="joCx3huDAaNIsLEse6iR-69" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=1;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=1;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;dashed=1;dashPattern=1 1;fontSize=16;fontColor=#00CC00;strokeWidth=1.5;strokeColor=#1A1A1A;endArrow=block;endFill=1;" parent="1" source="joCx3huDAaNIsLEse6iR-55" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="1224" y="685" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="1484" y="210" as="targetPoint" /> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="1598" y="770" /> <mxPoint x="1598" y="210" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="joCx3huDAaNIsLEse6iR-70" value="<div style=""><font color="#1a1a1a">DISCUSSION</font></div><div style=""><font color="#1a1a1a"><br></font></div><font color="#1a1a1a">Stores:<br><span style="font-weight: 400;">Built into Svelte unlike with other web frameworks. Easy to use.</span><br><span style="font-weight: 400;">Custom stores is also worth looking into to centralize entire code snippets for updating stores that might be invoked by multiple components. Example: fetch.</span><br><br></font>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=12;fontStyle=1;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="888" y="850" width="700" height="118" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="joCx3huDAaNIsLEse6iR-75" value="<font style="font-size: 16px;"><b>App.svelte</b></font>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#007FFF;strokeColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="1884" y="300" width="140" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="joCx3huDAaNIsLEse6iR-79" value="<font style="font-size: 16px;"><b>Parent.svelte</b></font>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#007FFF;strokeColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="1884" y="470" width="140" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="joCx3huDAaNIsLEse6iR-82" value="<font style="font-size: 16px;"><b>Child.svelte</b></font>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#007FFF;strokeColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="1884" y="630" width="140" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="joCx3huDAaNIsLEse6iR-91" value="<font size="1" style=""><b style="font-size: 15px;">Component.svelte</b></font>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#007FFF;strokeColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="1884" y="740" width="140" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="joCx3huDAaNIsLEse6iR-92" value="<font color="#1a1a1a">Legend:<br><span style="font-weight: normal;"><span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>Component<br><span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>Props<br><span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>Passing data upwards with a function passed as props<br><span style="white-space: pre;">&nbsp; </span>(Global) Store<br><span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>Context API</span></font>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=12;fontStyle=1" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="1694" y="180" width="350" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="joCx3huDAaNIsLEse6iR-94" value="setContext("key", "value")" style="edgeLabel;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];fontSize=12;" parent="1" connectable="0" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="1954" y="350" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="joCx3huDAaNIsLEse6iR-95" value="<font color="#ffffff">Any component can use the Context API to pass a value downwards in the hierarchy</font>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=#FF9999;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=12;fontStyle=1" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="1694" y="300" width="160" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="joCx3huDAaNIsLEse6iR-96" value="<font color="#1a1a1a" style="font-size: 40px;"><b style="">Ways of passing data in WebFrameworks</b></font>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=15;fontColor=#00CC00;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="1694" y="59" width="430" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="joCx3huDAaNIsLEse6iR-97" value="<font color="#ffffff">The smart thing about context is that you can bypass components and don't have to pass the data down every component in the tree</font>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=#FF9999;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=12;fontStyle=1" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="1694" y="723" width="160" height="91" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="joCx3huDAaNIsLEse6iR-98" value="getContext("key")" style="edgeLabel;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];fontSize=12;" parent="1" connectable="0" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="1954" y="790" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="joCx3huDAaNIsLEse6iR-99" value="" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;fontSize=40;fillColor=#FF9999;strokeColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="1694" y="251" width="10" height="10" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="joCx3huDAaNIsLEse6iR-100" value="" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;fontSize=40;strokeColor=#1A1A1A;fillColor=#FFFFFF;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="1694" y="208" width="10" height="10" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="joCx3huDAaNIsLEse6iR-101" value="" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;fontSize=40;fillColor=#FF66B3;strokeColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="1694" y="222" width="10" height="10" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="joCx3huDAaNIsLEse6iR-102" value="" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;fontSize=40;fillColor=#00CCCC;strokeColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="1694" y="237" width="10" height="10" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="joCx3huDAaNIsLEse6iR-103" value="" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;fontSize=40;fillColor=#007FFF;strokeColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="1694" y="193" width="10" height="10" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="joCx3huDAaNIsLEse6iR-106" value="<div style=""><font color="#1a1a1a">DISCUSSION</font></div><div style=""></div><div style=""><span style="font-weight: 400;"><font color="#1a1a1a"><br></font></span></div><font color="#1a1a1a"><div style=""><span style="background-color: initial;">Context API</span><span style="background-color: initial;">:</span></div><div style=""><span style="background-color: initial; font-weight: normal;">Since Svelte has stores natively there are few reasons to use them.&nbsp;</span></div><div style="font-weight: 400;"><span style="background-color: initial;">But they are part of other web frameworks even the ones that do not support stores.</span></div><div style="font-weight: 400;"><span style="background-color: initial;">Note that the context is not reactive and data is only inherited downwards in the hierarchy.&nbsp;</span></div></font>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=12;fontStyle=1;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="1694" y="850" width="700" height="95" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="joCx3huDAaNIsLEse6iR-107" value="<font color="#ffffff">Beware! Unlike stores that support subscribing to changes, the data in the context is not reactive.</font>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=#FF9999;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=12;fontStyle=1" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="2054" y="747.5" width="250" height="45" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="joCx3huDAaNIsLEse6iR-109" value="<font style="font-size: 40px;"><b style="">Props</b></font>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=15;fontColor=#FF66B3;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="500" y="43" width="155" height="63" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="joCx3huDAaNIsLEse6iR-110" value="<font color="#00cccc" style="font-size: 40px;"><b style="">Stores</b></font>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=15;fontColor=#00CC00;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="1328" y="43" width="155" height="63" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="joCx3huDAaNIsLEse6iR-111" value="<span style="font-size: 40px;"><b style=""><font color="#ff9999">Context</font></b></span>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=15;fontColor=#00CC00;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="2129" y="43" width="155" height="63" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="joCx3huDAaNIsLEse6iR-116" value="" style="edgeStyle=none;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;rounded=0;strokeColor=#000000;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="100" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="1328" y="470" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="1244" y="470" as="targetPoint" /> <Array as="points" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="joCx3huDAaNIsLEse6iR-117" value="<font color="#000000">Subscribe</font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="1257" y="440" width="71" height="26" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="joCx3huDAaNIsLEse6iR-118" value="" style="edgeStyle=none;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;rounded=0;strokeColor=#000000;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="100" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="1376" y="440" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="1376" y="375.91" as="targetPoint" /> <Array as="points" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="joCx3huDAaNIsLEse6iR-119" value="<div style="text-align: left;"><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: initial;">Set /</span></div><font color="#000000"><div style="text-align: left;"><span style="background-color: initial;">Update</span></div></font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" div.div: Note: The functions here follow a common convention. Functions passed as props begin with "on" and functions in components begin with "handle".

div.div: Props can only be passed downwards...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 698px; height: 1px; padding-top: 882px; margin-left: 2px;

font-weight: normal;

span.font: Only use for components that always belong together or as props that extends the reusability of a component. A potential problem is that props ruin the reusability of single components if they force a certain structure.

div.style: font-weight: 400;

span.font: The same problem as above but worse. Either the child cannot exist without its parent anymore or every component that wants to use the child must implement the same handler method.

b.font:
All components can access all stores.
If it's a writable store they can update it.
If it's a readable they can only get the value.

switch.text: All components can access all stores....

div.b:
Stores are outside of
the component hierarchy and defined in .js files.

div.font:
Stores:
Built into Svelte unlike with other web frameworks. Easy to use.
Custom stores is also worth looking into to centralize entire code snippets for updating stores that might be invoked by multiple components. Example: fetch.

div.font: Any component can use the Context API to pass a value downwards in the hierarchy

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 158px; height: 1px; padding-top: 726px; margin-left: 1635px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;

div.font: The smart thing about context is that you can bypass components and don't have to pass the data down every component in the tree

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 748px; margin-left: 1895px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.span: Since Svelte has stores natively there are few reasons to use them.

div.style: font-weight: 400;
div.span: But they are part of other web frameworks even the ones that do not support stores.

div.style: font-weight: 400;
div.span: Note that the context is not reactive and data is only inherited downwards in the hierarchy.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 248px; height: 1px; padding-top: 727px; margin-left: 1995px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;

div.font: Beware! Unlike stores that support subscribing to changes, the data in the context is not reactive.
